job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Team OMGbrbrOrderMyGear is the industry leader in technology for the team gear and promotional product space OMG continues to push boundaries shaping the future of group online commerce We approach challenges as opportunities and we are continuing to build a Team of OMGers who work hard welcome change and live out our MagicbrbrCome join us at OMG You can play a pivotal role in this rapidly changing industry as we scale our platform and improve the eCommerce experience for our clients and their customersbrbrOur MagicbrbrTEAM IS EVERYTHINGbrbrWe Invest in Each OtherbrbrWe Create SolutionsbrbrWe Enjoy the RidebrbrEMBRACE IT OWN IT ALL INbrbrEngineering  OMGbrbrAs a Software Engineer you will be part of a growing development Team and directly impact the development process and our culture We are building our platform with tools like Docker Kubernetes Go PHP Node React and other exciting technologies  we believe in picking the right tool for the jobbrbrDay in the LifebrulliYou will work closely with a Team to understand feature requests help plan development work and implement software solutionsliliYou will implement fixes to existing software defectsliliYou aloneliliTrack record of solving problems and owning your visionliliYou need to be crisp and detailoriented and willing to own an outcome and run with it without somebody telling you exactly how to
